verses.text: If \add it had\add* not \add been\add* the \sc Lord\sc* who was on our side, Now may Israel say;
If \add it had\add* not \add been\add* the \sc Lord\sc* who was on our side, When men rose up against us:
Then they had swallowed us up quick, When their wrath was kindled against us:
Then the waters had overwhelmed us, The stream had gone over our soul:
Then the proud waters Had gone over our soul.
Blessed \add be\add* the \sc Lord\sc*, Who hath not given us \add as\add* a prey to their teeth.
Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: The snare is broken, and we are escaped.
Our help \add is\add* in the name of the \sc Lord\sc*, Who made heaven and earth.
